verses.verse: And God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and fill <S%H4390><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

"And the fear <S%H4172><s%> of you and the terror <S%H2844><s%> of you shall be on every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H9130><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> and on every <S%H3605><s%> bird <S%H5775><s%> of the sky; <S%H8064><s%> with everything <S%H3605><s%> that creeps <S%H7430><s%> on the ground, <S%H127><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the fish <S%H1709><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> into your hand <S%H3027><s%> they are given. <S%H5414><s%>

"Every <S%H3605><s%> moving <S%H7431><s%> thing <S%H7431><s%> that is alive <S%H2416><s%> shall be food <S%H402><s%> for you; I give <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> to you, as [I gave] the green <S%H3418><s%> plant. <S%H6212><s%>
"Only <S%H389><s%> you shall not eat <S%H398><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> with its life, <S%H5315><s%> [that is,] its blood. <S%H1818><s%>

"And surely <S%H389><s%> I will require <S%H1875><s%> your lifeblood <S%H1818><s%>; <S%H5315><s%> from every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H9130><s%> I will require <S%H1875><s%> it. And from [every <S%H376><s%>] man, <S%H120><s%> from every man <S%H120><s%>'s brother <S%H251><s%> I will require <S%H1875><s%> the life <S%H5315><s%> of man.

"Whoever sheds <S%H8210><s%> man <S%H120><s%>'s blood, <S%H1818><s%> By man <S%H120><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be shed, <S%H8210><s%> For in the image <S%H6754><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> He made <S%H6213><s%> man.
"And as for you, be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and multiply; <S%H7235><s%> Populate <S%H8317><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> abundantly <S%H8317><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%> in it."
Then God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Noah <S%H5146><s%> and to his sons <S%H1121><s%> with him, saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Now behold, <S%H2009><s%> I Myself <S%H589><s%> do establish <S%H6965><s%> My covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you, and with your descendants <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you;

and with every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that is with you, the birds, <S%H5775><s%> the cattle, <S%H929><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H9130><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> with you; of all <S%H3605><s%> that comes <S%H3318><s%> out of the ark, <S%H8392><s%> even every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H9130><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

"And I establish <S%H6965><s%> My covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you; and all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall never <S%H3808><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> be cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> by the water <S%H4325><s%> of the flood, <S%H3999><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall there again <S%H5750><s%> be a flood <S%H3999><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

And God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H2088><s%> is the sign <S%H226><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am making <S%H5414><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Me and you and every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that is with you, for all <S%H5769><s%> successive <S%H5769><s%> generations; <S%H1755><s%>
I set <S%H5414><s%> My bow <S%H7198><s%> in the cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and it shall be for a sign <S%H226><s%> of a covenant <S%H1285><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Me and the earth. <S%H776><s%>

"And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about, when I bring <S%H9422><s%> a cloud <S%H6051><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> that the bow <S%H7198><s%> shall be seen <S%H7200><s%> in the cloud, <S%H6051><s%>

and I will remember <S%H2142><s%> My covenant, <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is between <S%H996><s%> Me and you and every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh; <S%H1320><s%> and never <S%H3808><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> shall the water <S%H4325><s%> become <S%H1961><s%> a flood <S%H3999><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> flesh. <S%H1320><s%>

"When the bow <S%H7198><s%> is in the cloud, <S%H6051><s%> then I will look <S%H7200><s%> upon it, to remember <S%H2142><s%> the everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> between <S%H996><s%> God <S%H430><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> that is on the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Noah, <S%H5146><s%> "This <S%H2088><s%> is the sign <S%H226><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have established <S%H6965><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Me and all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> that is on the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%> who came <S%H3318><s%> out of the ark <S%H8392><s%> were Shem <S%H8035><s%> and Ham <S%H2526><s%> and Japheth; <S%H3315><s%> and Ham <S%H2526><s%> was the father of Canaan. <S%H1><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> [were] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noah; <S%H5146><s%> and from these <S%H428><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> was populated. <S%H9339><s%>
Then Noah <S%H5146><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> farming <S%H376><s%> <S%H127><s%> and planted <S%H5193><s%> a vineyard. <S%H3754><s%>
And he drank <S%H8354><s%> of the wine <S%H3196><s%> and became <S%H7937><s%> drunk, <S%H7937><s%> and uncovered <S%H1540><s%> himself inside <S%H8432><s%> his tent. <S%H168><s%>

And Ham, <S%H2526><s%> the father of Canaan, <S%H1><s%> saw <S%H3667><s%> the nakedness <S%H7200><s%> of his father, and told <S%H6172><s%> his two <S%H1><s%> brothers <S%H5046><s%> outside. <S%H8147><s%>

But Shem <S%H8035><s%> and Japheth <S%H3315><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a garment <S%H8071><s%> and laid <S%H7760><s%> it upon both <S%H8147><s%> their shoulders <S%H7926><s%> and walked <S%H1980><s%> backward <S%H322><s%> and covered <S%H3680><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of their father; and their faces <S%H1><s%> were turned <S%H6440><s%> away, <S%H322><s%> so that they did not see <S%H322><s%> their father's nakedness. <S%H7200><s%>
When Noah <S%H5146><s%> awoke <S%H3364><s%> from his wine, <S%H3196><s%> he knew <S%H3045><s%> what <S%H834><s%> his youngest <S%H6996><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> to him.
So he said, <S%H559><s%> "Cursed <S%H779><s%> be Canaan; <S%H3667><s%> A servant <S%H5650><s%> of servants <S%H5650><s%> He shall be to his brothers. <S%H251><s%>"
He also said, <S%H559><s%> "Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> The God <S%H430><s%> of Shem; <S%H8035><s%> And let Canaan <S%H3667><s%> be his servant. <S%H5650><s%>

"May God <S%H430><s%> enlarge <S%H9464><s%> Japheth, <S%H3315><s%> And let him dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the tents <S%H168><s%> of Shem; <S%H8035><s%> And let Canaan <S%H3667><s%> be his servant. <S%H5650><s%>"
And Noah <S%H5146><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the flood. <S%H3999><s%>
So all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and he died. <S%H4191><s%>
